properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SALARY FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE ENT_YN = 'N' AND EMP_ID = ?
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMAIL, EMP_NO, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE ENT_YN = 'N'
SELECT LPAD(MAX(EMP_ID) + 1, 3, '0') AS EMP_ID FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE;

INSERT INTO TBL_EMPLOYEE ( EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE , DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS , MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, NULL, DEFAULT )
UPDATE TBL_EMPLOYEE SET ENT_DATE = ? , ENT_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMP_ID = ?
